#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 400MHz or better
RAM: 128MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Super Slyder_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Direct an adorable ball named Slyder through a thrilling set of mazes. You guessed it ... the blue loveable hero is back with an all-new addictive adventure containing level-altering items, 9 unique characters, and hilarious animations. This new slippery version also comes with 280+ challenging levels and an easy-to-use level editor. Play the levels at your own pace with level-skipping ability. Let the stress fall away as you slide into this fun adventure!

#################################################
